title: Hurrah For Little Noddy
description: The second of the original Noddy stories is lovingly republished in a beautiful hardback book to treasure. Noddy has to find a way to make money for himself as he settles into life in Toy Town. Will he find a job cleaning houses and washing cars? Or will his new car help him earn money? Noddy makes new friends as his adventures in Toyland continue.
author: Enid Blyton
